title: Berries with Lemon and Sugar
introduction: Experience the delightful harmony of fresh berries enhanced by a simple drizzle of lemon juice and a sprinkle of sugar. This versatile dish can be made with one variety of berry or a mix, and it pairs perfectly with a scoop of lemon ice or sorbet for an extra touch of freshness.
instructions: In a large bowl, gently toss the berries together. Drizzle with the lemon juice and sugar to taste. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Place the berries in shallow serving dishes. Serve immediately.
